name: Unique Comment Notify
author: Belmin Fernandez

sections.description:
Unique Comment Notify appends the comment author’s name to the subject of the
notification message sent to the blogger. This prevents Gmail and other
threading e-mail clients from grouping all notification e-mails for a post
into one conversation.

Further documentation

Visit this project’s wiki page for more documentation.

Release Notes

1.0: Initial publication of the plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload unique-comment-notify.zip to your WordPress plugins directory (usually in wp-content/plugins).
  2. Unzip the file and you should see the folder unique-comment-notify in the plugins directory.
  3. Activate the plugin in your WordPress Administrator page’s plugin section (usually something like http://example.com/wp-admin/plugins.php).
